CryptoElections.name: CryptoElections
CryptoElections.description:
Description
What is CryptoElections?
CryptoElections is a game about leading the countries by running an election campaign in cities. The more electorate live the city — the more votes you get. Once you get the majority — you become a president. The aim is to become a president in as many countries as possible. President will get 1% commission fee from every transaction in his country. If you are the mayor of the city and someone wants to beat you will get up to 2 times more you paid.

CryptoElements.name: CryptoElements
CryptoElements.description:
Description
What is CryptoElements?
Crypto Elements is a platform for collecting 100% unique and one of a kind digital chemical elements. Each of them is represented by only one ERC 721 token. It can not be destroyed or replicated, it is insured by logic behind Smart Contract deployed on Ethereum Blockchain.

CryptoEmoji.name: CryptoEmoji
CryptoEmoji.description:
Description
What is CryptoEmoji?
A Tycoon-style game built around the concept we coined as #Emojinomics. In this game, the player must compete with other players to acquire resources (?, ?, ?), craft unique products consuming resources (??⚡? - “Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep”), or HODL for a later opportunity.

CryptoFishing.name: CryptoFishing
CryptoFishing.description:
Description
What is CryptoFishing?
CryptoFishing is a casual game on the blockchain，the featuring a relatively "easy" theme and a better visual design. Players can fish by purchasing different types of hooks (the more advanced hooks catch fishes with more value), and fishes can be directly converted into the current digital token and transferred to the player's wallet. The player pays the digital token of the corresponding hook by fishing. 5% of the token charged as a service fee and 10% of the token entered into the bonus pool. The bonus pool will be accumulated until the player catches the legendary dragon and take the bonus pool away.

CryptoFlip Cars.name: CryptoFlip Cars
CryptoFlip Cars.description:
Description
What is CryptoFlip Cars?
A car collectable trading card game that pays interest

CryptoFlowers.name: CryptoFlowers
CryptoFlowers.description:
Description
What is CryptoFlowers?
CryptoFlowers is a game about collecting and breeding digital flowers.?? Using the power of Smart Contracts and Ethereum network, the game allows you to collect, breed and exchange unique digital flowers. While CryptoFlowers are not digital currency, it provides the same level of security. Each Cryptoflower is genetically unique, it cannot be destroyed, taken away or replicated, and it will always bloom!?

CryptoFollowers.name: CryptoFollowers
CryptoFollowers.description:
Description
What is CryptoFollowers?
When CryptoFollowers tokens that you own are sold or when you receive a reward for various events or the ranking, the payment will be completed through ethereum.

CryptoFootball.name: CryptoFootball
CryptoFootball.description:
Description
What is CryptoFootball?
The world's first football simulation game on the blockchain

cryptogame.bet.name: cryptogame.bet
cryptogame.bet.description:
Description
What is cryptogame.bet?
Platform game created by Cryptogame on Smart contract Blockchain Ethereum. All games are completely Autonomous and do not have specific algorithms to calculate the combinations. Winning or losing in Cryptogame depends on your luck. Gaming platform, Cryptogame consists of four sections - Dice, Slots, Casino, and tournaments of Classic games between the players. In each section you will find lots of interesting games. For playing Cryptogame you need MetaMask or Trust(in mobile version). After selecting the desired game bet and play. If you win, a Smart contract will give you the winning to the purse from which rate. Commission gaming platform has the lowest percentage, have a question? - read the FAQ Play and win. Try your luck.

CryptoGems.name: CryptoGems
CryptoGems.description:
Description
What is CryptoGems?
Get a Miner. Mine Gems. Build your Army

Cryptogirl.name: Cryptogirl
Cryptogirl.description:
Description
What is Cryptogirl?
Cryptogirl is the world’s first blockchain-based cultivation game of collectible Cryptogirl cards. Exquisite Cryptogirl of various forms are drafted and colored by famous Japanese artists etc., which are of great value of collection. Players may summon, break up or upgrade their Cryptogirls or use them in battles as well as in other ways, enjoying their rich and unprecedented game experience.

CryptoGit.name: CryptoGit
CryptoGit.description:
Description
What is CryptoGit?
Famous open source projects as Blockchain Smart Contracts! Own tokens, make money and support maintainers! When you purchase a Card, the card is instantly re-listed for sale at a higher price! If someone buys your card from you - you get paid up to double the amount you originally invested in ETH! 4% of profits goes to project maintainers!

CryptoGods.name: CryptoGods
CryptoGods.description:
Description
What is CryptoGods?
Own CryptoGods and Mine God-Power-Coin (GPC).

CryptoGol.io.name: CryptoGol.io
CryptoGol.io.description:
Description
What is CryptoGol.io?
Cryptogol is a descentralized P2P (person-to-person) game in which you can challenge other players in a thrilling penalti kick match. The game is based on smart contracts on the Ethereum network.

Cryptograph.name: Cryptograph
Cryptograph.description:
Description
What is Cryptograph?
Founded by a team of entrepreneurs, impact investors and blockchain pioneers who share a joint passion in using technology to do good. Cryptographs are one-of-a-kind digital collectibles created by icons and artists that support good causes forever. Thanks to blockchain technology, each Cryptograph is 100% owned by the purchaser and cannot be forged or destroyed. A Cryptograph is a digital legacy. Cryptographs are sold at auction and then traded by collectors on the platform, raising money for good causes every time they are transacted. The platform makes charitable fundraising easier, instantly global and perpetual in nature. It offers a new way to do philanthropy in the digital age.

CryptoGrids.name: CryptoGrids
CryptoGrids.description:
Description
What is CryptoGrids?
CryptoGrids permanently stored on the blockchain using crypto technology. You may Buy, Sell, Show Grids Art. When someone bought your CryptoGrids, You will earn a 120% yield. The bonus pool will recive 48% and reward to the winner(after contract upgrade). Your inviter, contract author and CryptoGrids foundation will earn 10% each, The contract owner will earn 2%. If no one buys your CryptoGrids, they will be shown forever. Win-win! The "Gen 0" CryptoGrids Ether: 1-1000, 100% off 1001-3000, 90% off 3001-6000, 70% off 6001-10000, 40% off Amazing, Buy Now!

Cryptogs.name: Cryptogs
Cryptogs.description:
Description
What is Cryptogs?
Play pogs on the blockchain! Whip out your slammer and get rad.

CryptoHands.name: CryptoHands
CryptoHands.description:
Description
What is CryptoHands?
CryptoHands - it's a first open MLM based on Ethereum smart-contract. The project is transparent and all transactions between participants are visible on the blockchain.

CryptoHearthStone.name: CryptoHearthStone
CryptoHearthStone.description:
Description
What is CryptoHearthStone?
The "CryptoHearthStone" is the "HearthStone" combined with the blockchain technology card collection game, provided to the vast majority of players and collectors. Each card has its own unique value.
